reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one mentioning its hint of sparkle, and appreciate its good quality and perfect fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality
items.body: My daughter is 154Lb, 5.11 1/2 and she ordered a size 6. the lases is the back were really good, the dress it is really elegant and the finished it is very good quality. If you provide the seller with your measures, they will assist you to buy the best size possible. Great value for the money you paid. the Fabric is really good, and the length was the perfect when you please the extra accessories bellow the dress you can make it as puffy as you want. Read more
items.author: Aya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made!
items.body: Ordering a dress like this sight unseen I feel is always risky. However, the seller was extremely communicative. They made the dress to my custom specs (I've never had a custom made piece of clothing before so I loved that aspect). The seller was super responsive and told me everything to expect. The dress shipped extremely quick and HOLY COW! I did not expect the dress to be so well made! The material is thick, the boning is solid, the fit is perfect and there is so much attention to detail. This dress has a hint of sparkle and so many beautiful embellishments. I am 5-feet 1 inch tall. I weigh 164 lbs and am 51 years old. I got this dress for a Fairy Ball my daughter and I are attending and let me just tell you.... I absolutely LOVE this dress. Thank you for such a wonderful and affordable product! Definitely worth the money and the short wait. (I was able to watch the tracking as it happened through their carrier and knew exactly when it landed stateside.) Definitely purchase from this seller again! Read more
items.author: Carolynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and stunning
items.body: Used this for a Beauty and the Beast costume, and it worked perfectly! Using a separate hoop skirt underneath gave me a stronger shape and actually made it easier to move around. Definitely true to size, and the seamstresses were very communicative and delivered exactly as I had asked. Read more
items.author: Sofia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress all around
items.body: The dress was perfect and turned out beautiful we bought a ring skirt to go underneath Read more
items.author: Brandon Lodien

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful gown!
items.body: This is such a beautiful gown, with a really big full skirt. The fabric is soft and flows so beautifully. It laces up the back with satin cords. It does seem to run small so glad we had ordered up a size. I might have gone up one more size so that the lacing in the back didn't need to be tight. Unfortunately we did return the dress though as the celebration it was for was cancelled. The return process was a bit clunky but ultimately the seller provided excellent service. Read more
items.author: btags

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: My daughter used it on her debut. She loves it and it has a good quality. Read more
items.author: Anz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vestido fino y elegante
items.body: Muy fino, que principio tenia duda que fuera a gustarle a la niña pero dejenme decirles que le encantó Read more
items.author: Claudia Castro

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Gown
items.body: Very pretty dress, but you need a petticoat to make it puffy. Read more
items.author: May

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Yellow Dark, Peach, Fuchsia, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Plum, Aquamarine, Blush Pink, Lavender, Lilac Deep, Lavender Dark, Royal Blue, Mauve. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
